body_html: Have you installed the GPU version on both machines? I think the placer uses information about the locally registered kernels to make placement decisions, so if you connect your session to a process that only has the CPU kernels, it won't use a GPU anywhere. (This is a bit embarrassing, and we should fix it....)

body: Have you installed the GPU version on both machines? I think the placer uses information about the locally registered kernels to make placement decisions, so if you connect your session to a process that only has the CPU kernels, it won't use a GPU anywhere. (This is a bit embarrassing, and we should fix it....)
